passive.name: Verdict
passive.description: Increases the wearer's DEF by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> and Effect Hit Rate by <orangeStrong>{{4}}%</orangeStrong>. Increases the chance for the wearer to be attacked by enemies. When the wearer is attacked, increase their DEF by an extra <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong> until the end of the wearer's turn.
